name: erth_battlebegins_01
text: Time to shake things up and see where they settle.
text_simple: time to shake things up and see where they settle

text: First Blood...and you had better get used to it.
text_simple: first blood and you had better get used to it

name: erth_move_09
text: The earth moves under my feet!

name: erth_cast_04
text: The time you've all been waiting for.
text_simple: the time youve all been waiting for

name: erth_level_01
text: Stronger by an order of magnitude!
text_simple: stronger by an order of magnitude

name: erth_level_05
text: I'll shake them to their cores.
text_simple: ill shake them to their cores

name: erth_kill_08
text: It was your own damn fault.
text_simple: it was your own damn fault
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A silver hero chat wheel was used

name: erth_kill_11
text: Don't take that magnitude with me.
text_simple: dont take that magnitude with me
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A grandmaster hero chat wheel was used

name: erth_rival_01
text: Tiny, your name is still too big for you.
text_simple: tiny your name is still too big for you

name: erth_rival_02
text: I broke you into little bits.
text_simple: i broke you into little bits

name: erth_rival_03
text: Was the soil too rocky to hold your roots?
text_simple: was the soil too rocky to hold your roots

name: erth_rival_04
text: You'll find no safe soil here.
text_simple: youll find no safe soil here

name: erth_rival_05
text: Who gave you permission to prance across the earth?
text_simple: who gave you permission to prance across the earth

name: erth_rival_06
text: No longer will your hooves dig into my hide.
text_simple: no longer will your hooves dig into my hide

name: erth_rival_07
text: This is no place for a mother.
text_simple: this is no place for a mother

name: erth_rival_08
text: Pick a different place to raise a family next time.
text_simple: pick a different place to raise a family next time

name: erth_rival_09
text: I'll not bow to you, Sand King, but I liked your style.
text_simple: ill not bow to you sand king but i liked your style

name: erth_rival_10
text: A shaken clock will soon stop ticking.
text_simple: a shaken clock will soon stop ticking

name: erth_rival_11
text: The only good clock is a stopped clock.
text_simple: the only good clock is a stopped clock

name: erth_rival_17
text: It was time to clear the underbrush.
text_simple: it was time to clear the underbrush

name: erth_rival_18
text: I didn't need a contract to hunt you down.
text_simple: i didnt need a contract to hunt you down

name: erth_rival_20
text: It was getting far too crowded.
text_simple: it was getting far too crowded

text: Phantom Lancer, I hate all of you.

name: erth_respawn_09
text: The Earth and I rise as one.
text_simple: the earth and i rise as one

name: erth_rare_01
text: Did the earth move for you too?
text_simple: did the earth move for you too

name: erth_rare_03
text: I miss my gargoyle friends back in Nishai. Everyone here is so soft.
text_simple: i miss my gargoyle friends back in nishai everyone here is so soft

name: erth_rare_04
text: Strange creatures, knights...hard shells, with a liquid center.
text_simple: strange creatures knights hard shells with a liquid center

name: erth_rare_05
text: There may be many earths, but there's only one Earthshaker.
text_simple: there may be many earths but theres only one earthshaker

name: erth_purch_01

text: They call me the Fissure Man!

name: earth_arcana_ability_fissure_23

name: earth_arcana_ally_16

text_simple: time your volley well im going in

name: earth_arcana_ally_24
text: Perhaps I could traverse the space between worlds...
text_simple: perhaps i could traverse the space between worlds

name: earth_arcana_drum_01
text: My drum beats to the rhythm of the earth.
text_simple: my drum beats to the rhythm of the earth

name: earth_arcana_drum_02
text: I can feel the heartbeat of the earth mother.
text_simple: i can feel the heartbeat of the earth mother

name: earth_arcana_mem_01
text: There are echoes here...of enormous consequence.
text_simple: there are echoes here of enormous consequence

name: earth_arcana_mem_03
text: Where others falter, I must stand firm.
text_simple: where others falter i must stand firm

name: earth_arcana_mem_04
text: Things could go very wrong in a place like this...
text_simple: things could go very wrong in a place like this

name: earth_arcana_rare_01_04
text: Did the earth move for you too?
text_simple: did the earth move for you too

name: earth_arcana_rare_03_03
text: I miss my gargoyle friends back in Nishai. Everyone here is so soft.
text_simple: i miss my gargoyle friends back in nishai everyone here is so soft

name: earth_arcana_rare_04_02
text: Strange creatures, knights...hard shells, with a liquid center.
text_simple: strange creatures knights hard shells with a liquid center

name: earth_arcana_rare_05_02
text: There may be many earths, but there's only one Earthshaker.
text_simple: there may be many earths but theres only one earthshaker

name: earth_arcana_rival_48_01
text: I guess it was more my kind of boom town.
text_simple: i guess it was more my kind of boom town

name: earth_arcana_rival_49
text: The fires of the earth are not to be trifled with.
text_simple: the fires of the earth are not to be trifled with

name: earth_arcana_rival_53
text: They spoke of your arrival. But now I see you on your way.
text_simple: they spoke of your arrival but now i see you on your way

name: earth_arcana_rival_54
text: I had hoped to learn from you. All you've shown me is how to fail.
text_simple: i had hoped to learn from you all youve shown me is how to fail

name: earth_arcana_shitwiz_02
text: I've heard whispers of the wizard's return...
text_simple: ive heard whispers of the wizards return

name: earth_arcana_wheel_all_01_02
text: I'll watch the brains ooze out the side of your shattered skull.
text_simple: ill watch the brains ooze out the side of your shattered skull

name: earth_arcana_wheel_all_03
text: It will take more than that to shake the Earthshaker.
text_simple: it will take more than that to shake the earthshaker

name: earth_arcana_wheel_all_04
text: I won't dignify that with a response.
text_simple: i wont dignify that with a response

name: earth_arcana_wheel_all_06
text: I can't tell you how upset this makes me.
text_simple: i cant tell you how upset this makes me

name: earth_arcana_wheel_all_07
text: The earth remembers, friend. The earth remembers.
text_simple: the earth remembers friend the earth remembers

name: earth_arcana_wheel_all_08
text: The earth goes on. It will not remember you.
text_simple: the earth goes on it will not remember you

name: earth_arcana_wheel_deny_01
text: Nothing I've said signals agreement of any kind.
text_simple: nothing ive said signals agreement of any kind

text: The war of exchanged pleasantries begins.
text_simple: the war of exchanged pleasantries begins
